description.value:
Frequency once per day

Your past has left you numb to death's call. The first time each day that you regain Hit Points while you are @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Dying]{Dying}, you regain additional Hit Points equal to your level, and you neither gain the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Wounded]{Wounded} condition nor increase the value of this condition.

value.value: You have died at least once
